Articles.Content: Is it possible to use IVA props outside of IVA?
short answer is no. Internal Modules are not the same class as Part Modules; and Internal space is totally different from the space in external view.

Is it possible to use IVA props outside of IVA?
short answer is no. Internal Modules are not the same class as Part Modules; and Internal space is totally different from the space in external view.

However could use model and texture assets for part files, no?
oh yeah, model and texture is fair game for anything. Game behaviour is determined by the config file and has little to do with the model and texture.

That's what I was afraid of. I haven't delved that deep into IVA yet, but I have watched your vids on it nli2work and they have been really helpful. I guess I'll to look into triggers and try to make a plugin. Thanks for help guys
